features.featureTitle: Modify ONLY `frontend/src/pages/dashboards/SuperadminDashboard.tsx` to consume `actor.getSuperadminSummaryV1()` within the existing Ringkasan tab, adding minimal new local state (`summaryV1`, `summaryV1Loading`, `summaryV1Error`) and a Refresh control for this summary block only. This change must be additive and must not refactor or change the behavior/state/backend calls of the existing tabs beyond adding the new Ringkasan V1 block.

Perform a compile/runtime sanity pass for the patched backend and `SuperadminDashboard.tsx` ensuring: (1) the backend compiles, (2) the dashboard does not crash in anonymous identity state (no backend calls), (3) the dashboard does not crash while the actor is initializing, and (4) unexpected/missing backend method shape errors are handled gracefully with an English error message (no raw traps shown to the user).
